definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Most administrators think of paging as something that is onerous.
sentences.chinese: 大多数管理员都认为分页是一件很麻烦的事情。

sentences.english: A column break inserted in the last column of a page will act as a page break.
sentences.chinese: 插入到页面最后一列的分栏符会成为分页符。

sentences.english: What about maintaining the size of your paging space?
sentences.chinese: 那么如何维护分页空间的大小呢？

sentences.english: On some devices , the list will be paginated . set the.
sentences.chinese: 在一些设备上，必须对列表进行分页。

sentences.english: We are truly happy to exchange links with relevant sites.
sentences.chinese: 本页为轮播交换连结，更多的连结都在各分页。

sentences.english: A sliding sidebar on the left-hand side displays a page switcher with thumbnail previews.
sentences.chinese: 左边栏的滑动条还可以显示带预览图的分页切换。

sentences.english: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
sentences.chinese: 所有的文件内容都已分页时发生。

sentences.english: This loop will print out the page number and page headers at each page break.
sentences.chinese: 这个循环将在每一个分页处打印出页编号和页眉。

sentences.english: Checksums can help to improve the reliability of the paging space.
sentences.chinese: 校验和有助于提高分页空间的可靠性。

sentences.english: The system-allocated virtual memory that has been charged to a process and that can be paged.
sentences.chinese: 该系统分配的虚拟内存，已被控一个过程，可以分页。

sentences.english: Again, pagination does not support showing navigation links in a tree hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 此外，分页不支持在树层次结构中显示导航链接。

sentences.english: One good approach to writing better paging code is to use stored procedures.
sentences.chinese: 一个写出更好的分页代码的办法是使用存储过程。

sentences.english: The navigation bar also understands how to page through results.
sentences.chinese: 这个导航条还知道如何根据结果进行分页。

sentences.english: You should now have a functioning pager that provides the user a list of thumbnails.
sentences.chinese: 现在有了一个可用的分页器为用户提供一些缩略图。

sentences.english: Enter club page, select your club.
sentences.chinese: 进入棋社分页，点选所属的棋社。

sentences.english: The option to show a close button instead of the website icon in the left corner of the tab is configurable.
sentences.chinese: 您可设定在分页左上角显示关闭按钮而非网站图示。

definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
